hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: value
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Provide value as project name to specify target path.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: extras
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Provide extras as Docker image tag name to push onto registry.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: file_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Provide specific file to build Docker image.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e
cd ~
if [ ! -d "board_repo" ]; then
echo "Clone board repo from git server."
git clone root@gitserver:/gitserver/repos/board_repo
fi
cd board_repo
echo "Pull changes from git server."
git pull
echo "Build image tagged as $extras with $file_name"
echo "docker build -f $value/$file_name -t $extras ."
docker build -f $value/$file_name -t $extras .
#if [ ! -z $docker_username ] && [ ! -z $docker_password ]; then
# echo "Login docker registry with username and password."
# docker login --username $docker_username --password $docker_password $docker_registry
#fi
echo "Push image $extras"
docker tag $extras $docker_registry/$extras
docker push $docker_registry/$extras
echo "Remove pushed image."
docker rmi $extras
